Episodes.Title: The Great
Episodes.Actors: Elle Fanning, Nicholas Hoult, Phoebe Fox
Episodes.Plot: Catherine travels to Russia to marry the Emperor. After becoming Empress, she realizes Peter is a selfish brat. She feels hopeless until her servant, Marial, suggests they overthrow him.

Episodes.Title: The Beard
Episodes.Writer: Tony McNamara, Vanessa Alexander, Gretel Vella
Episodes.Actors: Elle Fanning, Nicholas Hoult, Phoebe Fox
Episodes.Plot: Catherine's attitude towards Russia and her role as its Empress takes a dangerous change of direction.

Episodes.Title: And You Sir, Are No Peter the Great
Episodes.Writer: Tony McNamara, Vanessa Alexander, Gretel Vella
Episodes.Actors: Elle Fanning, Nicholas Hoult, Phoebe Fox
Episodes.Plot: Recruitment to Catherine's cause is slow. Meanwhile, the Emperor sends Catherine a new 'friend'.

Episodes.Title: Moscow Mule
Episodes.Writer: Tess Morris, Tony McNamara, Vanessa Alexander
Episodes.Actors: Elle Fanning, Nicholas Hoult, Phoebe Fox
Episodes.Plot: Ensnared by court intrigues, Catherine seeks ways to disentangle herself.

Episodes.Title: War and Vomit
Episodes.Writer: James Wood, Tony McNamara, Vanessa Alexander
Episodes.Actors: Elle Fanning, Nicholas Hoult, Phoebe Fox
Episodes.Plot: A sudden turn of events moves Catherine closer to either becoming Empress or being executed.

Episodes.Title: Parachute
Episodes.Writer: Tony McNamara, Vanessa Alexander, Gretel Vella
Episodes.Actors: Elle Fanning, Nicholas Hoult, Phoebe Fox
Episodes.Plot: After his near-death experience, Peter is now open to Catherine's progressive ideas and wants to focus on an heir. Orlo tries to figure out who poisoned Peter and faces demons of his own.

Episodes.Title: A Pox on Hope
Episodes.Writer: Tony McNamara, Gretel Vella, Vanessa Alexander
Episodes.Actors: Elle Fanning, Nicholas Hoult, Phoebe Fox
Episodes.Plot: Catherine is feeling optimistic, until a smallpox breakout causes Peter to revert back to his old ways. Meanwhile, Leo and Catherine's relationship suffers and Georgina misses Peter.

Episodes.Title: Meatballs at the Dacha
Episodes.Writer: Tony McNamara, Amelia Roper, Vanessa Alexander
Episodes.Actors: Elle Fanning, Nicholas Hoult, Phoebe Fox
Episodes.Plot: Catherine's political abilities are tested when she's given an opportunity to travel abroad. Leo wants to leave court. Marial tries to keep him there by telling him about the coup.

Episodes.Title: Love Hurts
Episodes.Writer: Tony McNamara, Vanessa Alexander, Gretel Vella
Episodes.Actors: Elle Fanning, Nicholas Hoult, Phoebe Fox
Episodes.Plot: A body is discovered. Peter decides to torture everyone at the palace to find the murderous traitors. Marial confides in Archie about Catherine's plans. Catherine has a life changing revelation.

Episodes.Title: The Beaver's Nose
Episodes.Writer: Tony McNamara, Vanessa Alexander, Gretel Vella
Episodes.Actors: Elle Fanning, Nicholas Hoult, Phoebe Fox
Episodes.Plot: Catherine moves forward with the coup. Marial betrays her by revealing a secret. Catherine realizes that the only chance for a greater Russia is to fight, no matter the sacrifices.
